data

Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Library

  • public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the library of songs retrieved from Reddit.
    Author:
    Yohan Chalier

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String FILE_LIBRARY 
      private Jury jury 
      private java.util.ArrayList<Song> songs

      Library(java.io.File file)
      Builds a Library from an external JSON file.

      Builds a Library from a list of Reddit posts.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Library

        public Library(org.json.JSONArray posts)
        Builds a Library from a list of Reddit posts. If a SongException occurs, then the song is not added to the database.
        Parameters:
        posts - The JSON array containing the posts. Each post pertinent data are located in ["data"]

      • Library

        public Library(java.io.File file)
        throws org.json.JSONException,
               java.io.IOException
        Builds a Library from an external JSON file.
        Parameters:
        file -
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • getSongs

        public java.util.ArrayList<Song> getSongs()

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Format: 001: Artist - Title [Genre] (Fame score/Quality score)
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • toJSON

        public org.json.JSONObject toJSON()
                           throws org.json.JSONException
        Creates a JSON object containing all info. The object has one key 'list' that contains an array of JSON objects, each one representing a song.
        Returns:
        The library as a JSON object
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

      • computeScores

        public void computeScores()
        Computes and set the scores (fame & quality) for each song.

      • loadLibrary

        public static Library loadLibrary()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        If a library already exists in FILE_LIBRARY, loads it. Else, create a Reddit API to fetch a new library.
        Returns:
        A new library.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
